title: What two distinct musical cultures share musical similarities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Contemporary Latin American "Bachata" style music has a lot in common rhythmically with African contemporary electric music, especially with regards to guitar style, and syncopated rhythm, melodies that don't start on the "1".

Turkish "Pop-Folk Music"Bulgarian "Chalga"Romanian "Manele" These genres share styles, instruments and melodies with each other. Also these genres use same tunes (Arabic scale tune) in many songs. As a result, we can say that these genres share musical similarities.
